name: ClockWork (itch) (AlphaStudios)
description:
You are trapped by a mystery man who is mad at you for forgetting his birthday.  Use the F key to slow down time and use the boxes as stepping stones to get across gaps.

Also the doors are there to prevent playing multiple Audio Files at once sorry :)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KNOWN BUGS: You can get stuck to walls, when it sends you to the main menu at the end the mouse doesn't show up so you will have to alt-4, the present is a lie. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team Members were: Knotam, Praxtion, CanonicalGamer and special thanks to help me write the Script, Twitch Streamer Nitsuakitsune
